text: In the Name of the Law (Turkish: Kanun namina) is a 1953 Turkish drama film directed by Lütfi Akad and starring Ayhan Isik, Gülistan Güzey and Muzaffer Tema.Dönmez-Colin p.27 ==Main cast== * Ayhan Işık as Nazim * Gülistan Güzey as Ayten * Muzaffer Tema as Halil * Pola Morelli as Perihan * Talat Artemel as Sevket * Nese Yulaç as Nezahat * Settar Körmükçü as Kamil * Nubar Terziyan as Mahmut * Muazzez Arçay as Zehra * Temel Karamahmut as Polis Sefi * Renan Fosforoglu * Sadettin Erbil as Komiser * Riza Tüzün as Doktor * Kerim Pamukoglu * Mümtaz Alpaslan ==References== ==Bibliography== * Gönül Dönmez- Colin. The Routledge Dictionary of Turkish Cinema. Routledge, 2013. ==External links== * Category:1952 films Category:1952 crime drama films Category:Turkish-language films Category:Turkish films Category:Turkish crime drama films Category:Films about lawyers Category:Films directed by Lütfi Akad
title: In the Name of the Law (1952 film)
